news: [New v0.79] New Error Strategies for MySQL and PostgreSQL compatible with Order/Group By, Wider range of Characters Insertion including multibyte %bf, Various optimizations and bug fixes.
[New v0.78] Upgrade to Java 8, Study and optimize SQL expressions with panel SQL Engine, Database flavor: Access, MySQL injection with DOUBLE overflow.

[Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer.
[Programming] Contact the developer for any help with new features, CTF events and Burp integration.
[Roadmap] Injection strategies: Routed query / User Variable, WAF detection, Bruteforce of HTTP Auth, Arabic translation, Command line interface.
